alert.note: Alert for Adams; Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; Schuylkill; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 5:16PM EDT until April 01 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Southern Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 516 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pine Grove to Bonneauville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Harrisburg, York, Lebanon, Lower Allen, Hanover, Pottsville, Hershey, Ephrata, Colonial Park, Weigelstown and Elizabethtown. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 239 to 295. Interstate 78 from mile markers 0 to 8. Interstate 81 from mile markers 72 to 119. Interstate 83 between mile markers 1 and 40, and from mile markers 43 to 49. Interstate 283 from mile markers 0 to 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; Schuylkill; York
